LanguageData.Hediffs_AnimalsLv1.label: Animal Knowledge Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_AnimalsLv1.description: Kemono (Animal) Knowledge Tip 1: Earn experience by continuing to eat foods with the same type of buff.
LanguageData.Hediffs_AnimalsLv2.label: Animal Knowledge Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_AnimalsLv2.description: Kemono (Animal) Knowledge Tip 2: It may be possible to activate a short term ability boost.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Animals.label: Animal Knowledge
LanguageData.Hediffs_Animals.description: Kemono (Animal) Knowledge: I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
